channel.title: Colossians on Christian Internet Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Colossians on Christian Internet Resources

item.title: Colossians 1
item.description:
Colossians Chapter 1

1Paul, apostle of-Christ Jesus through (the) will of-God, and Timothy the brother, 2to-the saints in Colossae and faithful brothers in Christ. Grace to-you and peace from God (the) Father of-us.

3We-thak [the] God (the) Father of-the Lord of-us Jesus Christ, praying always about you, 4having-heard-about the faith of-you in Christ Jesus and the love that you-have unto all the saints 5through the hope [the] stored-up for-you in [the] heaven[s], which you-previously-heard-about in the word of-the truth of-the gospel, 6the-One being-present in you even-as also in all the world it-is bearing-fruit and growing even-as also in you from which day you-heard (it) and came-to-know the grace of-[the God in truth. 7Even-as you-learned from Epaphras, the beloved fellow-servant of-us, who is (a) faithful minister of-[the] Christ on-behalf-of you, 8the-one also having-made-evident to-us the love of-you in (the) Spirit.

item.title: Colossians 3
item.description:
Colossians Chapter 3

1If then you-were-raised-with [the] Christ, seek the-things above, where [the] Christ is-seated on (the) right (hand) of-[the] God. 2Set-your-mind-on the-things above, not the-things on [the] earth. 3For you-died and the life of-you has-been-hidden with Christ in [the] God. 4When [the] Christ, the life of-you, appears, then you also will-be-manifested with him in glory.

2Devote-yourselves to-[the] prayer, being-vigilant in it in thanksgiving, 3praying at-the-same-time/together also about us, in-order-that [the] God may-open for-us (a) door of-the word to-speak the mystery of-[the] Christ, on-account-lf which also I-have-been-put-in-prison. 4(Pray) in-order-that I-will-make┘it└manifest as it-is-necessary for-me to-speak. 5Walk in wisdom toward the-ones outside, making-good-use-of the opportunity. 6(Let) the word of-you always (be) in grace, seasoned with-salt, to-know-how it-is-necessary for-us to-answer each one.
